text: Natural England is a quango, a public body funded by government. It is responsible for protecting and preserving England's natural environment. This includes the land, flora and fauna, freshwater and marine environments, geology and soils. It also has a responsibility to help people enjoy, understand and access the natural environment. Natural England work aims for: * a healthy natural environment * enjoyment of the natural environment * sustainable use of the natural environment * a secure environmental future == Note == Category:2006 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Conservation organisations of the United Kingdom
title: Natural England
